formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Definitions via exponentials \(\displaystyle \sinh x = \frac{e^x - e^{-x}}{2}\) \(\displaystyle \cosh x = \frac{e^x + e^{-x}}{2}\) \(\displaystyle \tanh x = \frac{\sinh x}{\cosh x}\) Reciprocal functions are defined by \(\displaystyle \operatorname{sech} x = \frac{1}{\cosh x}\), \(\displaystyle \operatorname{csch} x = \frac{1}{\sinh x}\), \(\displaystyle \coth x = \frac{\cosh x}{\sinh x}\), whenever the denominators are nonzero.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Pythagorean-type identity \(\cosh^2 x - \sinh^2 x = 1\) Compare with the circular identity \(\cos^2 x + \sin^2 x = 1\): the sign in front of \(\sinh^2 x\) is negative instead of positive.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Addition formulas \(\sinh(x + y) = \sinh x \cosh y + \cosh x \sinh y\) \(\cosh(x + y) = \cosh x \cosh y + \sinh x \sinh y\) \(\tanh(x + y) = \dfrac{\tanh x + \tanh y}{1 + \tanh x \tanh y}\), whenever \(1 + \tanh x \tanh y \neq 0\)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Double-angle formulas \(\sinh(2x) = 2\sinh x \cosh x\) \(\cosh(2x) = \cosh^2 x + \sinh^2 x\) \(\tanh(2x) = \dfrac{2\tanh x}{1 + \tanh^2 x}\), whenever \(1 + \tanh^2 x \neq 0\)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \(\displaystyle \operatorname{arsinh} x = \ln\bigl(x + \sqrt{x^2 + 1}\bigr)\), all real \(x\) \(\displaystyle \operatorname{arcosh} x = \ln\bigl(x + \sqrt{x^2 - 1}\bigr)\), \(x \ge 1\) \(\displaystyle \operatorname{artanh} x = \tfrac{1}{2}\ln\left(\frac{1 + x}{1 - x}\right)\), \(|x| < 1\) \(\displaystyle \operatorname{arcoth} x = \tfrac{1}{2}\ln\left(\frac{x + 1}{x - 1}\right)\), \(|x| > 1\) \(\displaystyle \operatorname{arsech} x = \operatorname{arcosh}\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)\), \(0 < x \le 1\) \(\displaystyle \operatorname{arcsch} x = \operatorname{arsinh}\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)\), \(x \neq 0\)
